Actions.Name: Get air quality health index
Actions.Description: Return the official air quality health index (1 to 10) bases on key parameters. The national AQHI is based on three-hour average concentrations of ground-level ozone (O3), nitrogen dioxide (NO2), and fine particulate matter (PM2.5). O3 and NO2 are measured in parts per billion.

Actions.Name: Get carbon footprint from car travel
Actions.Description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car.

Actions.Name: Get carbon footprint from flight
Actions.Description: Calculate CO2e in Kg from a travel by air.

Actions.Name: Get carbon footprint from motor bike
Actions.Description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a motorbike travel.

Actions.Name: Get carbon footprint from public transit
Actions.Description: Return CO2e in Kg from the use of public transportation.

Actions.Name: Get clean hydro to carbon footprint
Actions.Description: Return the CO2e in Kg from the consumption of clean hydro energy.

Actions.Name: Get fuel to carbon footprint
Actions.Description: Return the CO2e in Kg from liters of diesel, petrol or LPG.

Actions.Name: Get traditional hydro to carbon footprint
Actions.Description: Calculate CO2e from the use of traditional hydro provider.

Actions.Name: Get tree equivalent
Actions.Description: Calculate how many trees it took to create paper.
